verses.verse: Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Ashbel <S%H788><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> and Aharah <S%H315><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%>
Nohah <S%H5119><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> and Rapha <S%H7498><s%> the fifth. <S%H2549><s%>
Bela <S%H1106><s%> had sons: <S%H1121><s%> Addar, <S%H146><s%> and Gera, <S%H1617><s%> and Abihud, <S%H31><s%>
and Abishua, <S%H50><s%> and Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> and Ahoah, <S%H265><s%>
and Gera, <S%H1617><s%> and Shephuphan, <S%H8197><s%> and Huram. <S%H2361><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ehud: <S%H261><s%> these are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Geba, <S%H1387><s%> and they carried <S%H1540><s%> them captive to Manahath: <S%H4506><s%>
and Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> and Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> and Gera, <S%H1617><s%> he carried <S%H1540><s%> them captive: <S%H3205><s%> and he became the father of Uzza <S%H5798><s%> and Ahihud. <S%H284><s%>

Shaharaim <S%H7842><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of children in the field of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> he had sent them away; <S%H7971><s%> Hushim <S%H2366><s%> and Baara <S%H1199><s%> were his wives. <S%H802><s%>
He became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Hodesh <S%H2321><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> Jobab, <S%H3103><s%> and Zibia, <S%H6644><s%> and Mesha, <S%H4331><s%> and Malcam, <S%H4445><s%>
and Jeuz, <S%H3263><s%> and Shachia, <S%H7634><s%> and Mirmah. <S%H4821><s%> These were his sons, <S%H1121><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households.
Of Hushim <S%H2366><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Abitub <S%H36><s%> and Elpaal. <S%H508><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal: <S%H508><s%> Eber, <S%H5677><s%> and Misham, <S%H4936><s%> and Shemed, <S%H8106><s%> who built <S%H1129><s%> Ono <S%H207><s%> and Lod, <S%H3850><s%> with its towns; <S%H1323><s%>

and Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> and Shema, <S%H8087><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Aijalon, <S%H357><s%> who put to flight <S%H1272><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gath; <S%H1661><s%>
and Ahio, <S%H283><s%> Shashak, <S%H8349><s%> and Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%>
and Zebadiah, <S%H2069><s%> and Arad, <S%H6166><s%> and Eder, <S%H5738><s%>
and Michael, <S%H4317><s%> and Ishpah, <S%H3472><s%> and Joha, <S%H3109><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah, <S%H1283><s%>
and Zebadiah, <S%H2069><s%> and Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> and Hizki, <S%H2395><s%> and Heber, <S%H2268><s%>
and Ishmerai, <S%H3461><s%> and Izliah, <S%H3152><s%> and Jobab, <S%H3103><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elpaal, <S%H508><s%>
and Jakim, <S%H3356><s%> and Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> and Zabdi, <S%H2067><s%>
and Elienai, <S%H462><s%> and Zillethai, <S%H6769><s%> and Eliel, <S%H447><s%>
and Adaiah, <S%H5718><s%> and Beraiah, <S%H1256><s%> and Shimrath, <S%H8119><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei, <S%H8096><s%>
and Ishpan, <S%H3473><s%> and Eber, <S%H5677><s%> and Eliel, <S%H447><s%>
and Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> and Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> and Hanan, <S%H2605><s%>
and Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> and Elam, <S%H5867><s%> and Anthothijah, <S%H6070><s%>
and Iphdeiah, <S%H3301><s%> and Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shashak, <S%H8349><s%>
and Shamsherai, <S%H8125><s%> and Shehariah, <S%H7841><s%> and Athaliah, <S%H6271><s%>
and Jaareshiah, <S%H3298><s%> and Elijah, <S%H452><s%> and Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham. <S%H3395><s%>
These were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households throughout their generations, <S%H8435><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men: <S%H3427><s%> these lived in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
In Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> there lived <S%H3427><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> whose wife <S%H802><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Maacah; <S%H4601><s%>
and his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> and Zur, <S%H6698><s%> and Kish, <S%H7027><s%> and Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and Nadab, <S%H5070><s%>
and Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> and Ahio, <S%H283><s%> and Zecher. <S%H2144><s%>

Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shimeah. <S%H8039><s%> They also <S%H637><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> with their brothers <S%H251><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> over against their brothers. <S%H5048><s%>

Ner <S%H5369><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kish; <S%H7027><s%> and Kish <S%H7027><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Saul; <S%H7586><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> and Malchishua, <S%H4444><s%> and Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and Eshbaal. <S%H792><s%>
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was Merib Baal; <S%H4807><s%> and Merib Baal <S%H4807><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah: <S%H4318><s%> Pithon, <S%H6377><s%> and Melech, <S%H4429><s%> and Tarea, <S%H8390><s%> and Ahaz. <S%H271><s%>

Ahaz <S%H271><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jehoaddah; <S%H3085><s%> and Jehoaddah <S%H3085><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Alemeth, <S%H5964><s%> and Azmaveth, <S%H5820><s%> and Zimri; <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Moza. <S%H4162><s%>

Moza <S%H4162><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Binea; <S%H1150><s%> Raphah <S%H7498><s%> was his son, <S%H1121><s%> Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Azel <S%H682><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> whose names <S%H8034><s%> are these: <S%H5840><s%> Azrikam, Bocheru, <S%H1074><s%> and Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> and Sheariah, <S%H8187><s%> and Obadiah, <S%H5662><s%> and Hanan. <S%H2605><s%> All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel. <S%H682><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eshek <S%H6232><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%> Ulam <S%H198><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Jeush <S%H3266><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> and Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the third. <S%H7992><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam <S%H198><s%> were mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> archers, <S%H1869><s%> and had many <S%H7235><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%>' sons, <S%H1121><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%> All these were of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
